title: Art Quiz
desc:
An interactive quiz where you can test your knowledge of fine arts. It provides three game type: artists quiz, pictures quiz and blitz. 
 Also, it has been translated into two languages and divided into categories. 
 This app was created on vanilla js without frameworks.

title: Thrift Shop
desc:
"Second-hand online shop", that allows you to add, delete items to common catalog, contact with other owners and sort/filter things. 
 Based on Nuxt.js, firebase backend and auth (REST), custom cookie authentication and ssr on some pages.

title: Upbox
desc: Responsive landing page created with Tailwind

title: Museum
desc: Responsive landing page with sliders, custom videoplayer and ticket purchase form.

title: Peeplz
desc:
Freelance start-up project. App that brings all your social networks together. 
 My job was to develop client side and improve SEO.
